plot: In a small and isolated village there's only one grave left at the cemetery. The ruler of the village creates a decree forbidding death. The old Clotilde watches over the last grave and the doctor denounces those who are close to death.
title: Decreto Fúnebre
plot_es: In a small and isolated village there's only one grave left at the cemetery. The ruler of the village creates a decree forbidding death. The old Clotilde watches over the last grave and the doctor denounces those who are close to death.
